Solution dataclass

class Solution.Solution(rendering_dict, node_trail, ordered_trails, state_grid, score, algorithm, path_problem, part_stock, absolute_path=<factory>)

Bases: object

Dataclass that contains information about the solution to a path problem.

absolute_path

Positions with parts used to get to position

algorithm

what algorithm has been used to search

node_trail

Dict containing all trail positions pointing to the part they are occupied by

ordered_trails

List with all trails in order from start to goal

part_stock

The amount of parts still available after applying the solution

path_problem
rendering_dict

Dict containing information on VpythonRendering of objects

score

measure of solution quality. The lower the score the better the solution.

state_grid

state grid with inserted solution layout
